item.description:
Come out for an evening of dancing to 70's and 80's funk music with the live 10 piece band Drastic Measures. There's nothing like getting down to a band with a good horn section! Last years Dance Party was a huge success with 300 people attending. This is an all ages event raising funds for a local charity, so perfect for those of who still like to dance but left the bar scene years ago! The venue is large and has a quiet area away from the band where you can actually have a conversation, too.

Check out the play list at this site:

https://sites.google.com/a/maynard.k12.ma.us/drastic-measures-information/home

Save a couple of dollars by paying with your rsvp or pay $15 at the door.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the front desk for Greg's table
item.name: Dance Party
